/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their gray and beige facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars of various colors are scattered along the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
